summary: This is an email from a Paralegal Specialist at the United States Attorney's Office forwarding a witness tracking spreadsheet. The email indicates ongoing witness management in an investigation, likely related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Paralegal Specialist
persons.context: Sender of the email from the United States Attorney's Office, responsible for managing and forwarding the witness tracking spreadsheet.

events.title: Witness Spreadsheet Distribution
events.description: A Paralegal Specialist at the United States Attorney's Office sends an email with an attached witness tracking spreadsheet to manage and designate witness types.

keyFacts: A witness tracking spreadsheet was created and circulated by the United States Attorney's Office on March 17, 2021.
The spreadsheet included a column to designate whether someone is a witness and the type of witness.
The document indicates active witness management in an ongoing investigation, likely related to the Epstein case.
